Instructions:

addi x1, x0, 5
addi x2, x0, 3
addi x3, x0, 2
addi x4, x0, -7

mul x5, x1, x4
mul x6, x2, x3
mul x7, x2, x4
mul x4, x1, x3

Binary:

00101|000|000|001|01
00011|000|000|010|01
00010|000|000|011|01
11001|000|000|100|01

00|100|001|111|101|00
00|011|010|111|110|00
00|100|010|111|111|00
00|011|001|111|100|00

Hex:

0010|1000|0000|0101	0x 2805

0001|1000|0000|1001	0x 1809

0001|0000|0000|1101	0x 100d

1100|1000|0001|0001	0x c811

0010|0001|1111|0100	0x 21f4

0001|1010|1111|1000	0x 1af8

0010|0010|1111|1100	0x 22fc

0001|1001|1111|0000	0x 19f0
